metadata.title: About | IMDb Play
metadata.description: Learn more about IMDb Play and our mission.

about.title: About IMDb Play
about.lead: IMDb Play is a demo streaming discovery platform built to help viewers find movies and series quickly, organize favorites, and continue watching across devices.

mission.heading: Our mission
mission.body: We focus on making content discovery feel effortless. Our catalog experience highlights trending titles, genre browsing, and personalized collections so users can spend less time searching and more time watching.

values.heading: What we value
values.itemOne: Simple and fast navigation across movies and series.
values.itemTwo: Accessible interfaces that support keyboard and screen-reader users.
values.itemThree: Reliable account features like watchlists and progress tracking.

metadata.title: Terms of Service | IMDb Play
metadata.description: Read the terms of service for using IMDb Play.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.lead: These Terms of Service govern your use of IMDb Play. By accessing or using the service, you agree to follow these terms.

account.heading: Account responsibilities
account.body: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activity performed under your account. Please notify us immediately of any unauthorized access.

acceptableUse.heading: Acceptable use
acceptableUse.itemOne: Do not attempt to disrupt or compromise platform security.
acceptableUse.itemTwo: Do not scrape, republish, or redistribute catalog data without permission.
acceptableUse.itemThree: Do not use the service for unlawful or abusive behavior.

changes.heading: Changes to these terms
changes.body: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of IMDb Play after updates are posted constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.

metadata.title: Privacy Policy | IMDb Play
metadata.description: Read the privacy policy for IMDb Play.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.lead: This Privacy Policy explains how IMDb Play collects, uses, and protects information when you use our application.

data.heading: Data we collect
data.itemOne: Basic account information such as email address and profile preferences.
data.itemTwo: Usage data like watchlist actions, favorites, and viewing progress.
data.itemThree: Technical data including device and browser information for diagnostics.

usage.heading: How we use data
usage.body: We use information to operate the service, personalize recommendations, improve performance, and protect user accounts. We do not sell personal data to third parties.

contact.heading: Contact for privacy requests
contact.prefix: You can request account data updates or deletion by emailing

metadata.title: Contact | IMDb Play
metadata.description: Get in touch with the IMDb Play team.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.lead: Need help with your account, a bug report, or general feedback? Reach out and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
